FEATURECREDITSADDEDINFORMATION
Character Modifier
- Behaviour1.0Allow/Disallow an NPC to react to the player and the player's actions.
- Movement-SpeedDunked1.6Change the movement-speed of an NPC.
- ClonerCsipszhacker641.5Create and delete clones of an NPC.
- Enabler/Disabler1.6Enable and disable an NPC.
- SizeAndres Marcel Sanchez Porras1.8Change the size of an NPC.
- VisibilityStephen Offutt1.9Toggles whether or not you can see an NPC.

- Slap-Speed Multiplier*1.13

- Change Detention timeCioss1.10Change the amount of seconds you spend in detention.

- Switch between 5 and 10 jumpsCHRISTI ZAPOI1.8Change how often you have to jump when Playtime gets you.
• Bully
- CooldownSyncopiteFan4451.8Change whether or not the Bully waits after being "satisfied".
• Gotta Sweep
- CooldownSyncopiteFan4451.8Change whether or not Gotta Sweep waits after cleaning.
• 1st Prize
- Turning-speed multiplierSyncopiteFan4451.8Changes how fast 1st Prize turns around.
Item Editor
- Inventory Slots1.2Change which items you're currently carrying.
- Item ValuesNSMug1.7Change item-specific values for certain items.
- Infinite ItemsSyncopiteFan4451.5Use any item, without losing it afterwards. (Does not apply to "It's a Bully")
Teleporter

- Notebook Teleporter1.3Teleport a Notebook to you or the other way around.

Player Modifier
- Infinite Stamina1.0Allows you to run forever.
- Noclip1.1Walk through all walls.
- 3D-Camera Movement1.0Rotate your camera up and down.

Scene ManagerCioss1.10
Additional Options
- Entity GPS1.0See the position of NPCs through the walls. (Automatically disables Occlusion Culling).
- '42'1.0The answer to any and all questions.
- Character Distance Meterthe swag hedgehog1.7Shows the distance between you and NPCs. (Requires "Entity GPS" to be active, to be seen)
- Disable HUDCioss1.11Hides the standard User Interface (Does not apply to mobile-control UI)
- Show FPSCioss1.11Displays a small frames-per-second display in the top left corner.
- Final Mode Red TintStephen Offutt1.12Toggles the Red-Tint, that appears after gethering all the notebooks.
- Occlusion-CullingToggles a performance-feature, that hides everything the player can't see normally.
Trippy Mode Menu
- Video DiarrheaCioss1.13Randomly switches all materials of objects in the current scene.
- Audio VomitCioss1.13Randomly switches all audio clips in the current scene.
- ScrabbleCioss1.13Randomly switches all words of labels in the current scene.
